title: BUG: Phase UI not deployed — no stepper visible, sub-routes show blank page
description:
Phase UI from PR #39 is completely absent from the staging deployment. No phase stepper is visible on the playbook page. Navigating to sub-routes like /playbook/campaign shows a blank page.

### Steps to Reproduce
1. Login to staging, navigate to /visionvolve/playbook
2. Look at the top of the page — no phase stepper (Strategy > Contacts > Messages > Campaign)
3. Only 'ICP Playbook' heading with Extract button is visible
4. Navigate to /visionvolve/playbook/campaign
5. Page shows completely blank (black screen)
6. Console shows: 'No routes matched location /visionvolve/playbook/campaign'

### Expected
- Horizontal phase stepper at top of playbook page
- Strategy phase highlighted as active
- Locked phases (Contacts, Messages, Campaign) grayed out
- Sub-routes redirect to current phase instead of blank page

### Actual
- No phase stepper anywhere on the page
- Sub-routes show blank page with 'No routes matched' console warning
- URL stays at the invalid route (no redirect)

### Root Cause Hypothesis
Phase UI components (PhaseIndicator, PhasePanel) from PR #39 were not included in the deployed frontend build. Also depends on PR #37 (BL-064) for API phase data.
